resources.string: Look up the IP on the Overmind webpage
Connection with the Overmind server failed. Check that the IP is correct.
Connection with the Overmind server lost. Please check back at a later time.
Unexpected interruption of the TCP data stream. Please check back at a later time.
The UDP socket did not receive any packet before the timeout. Please check your connection and try again at a later time.
"Could not identify the graphics chipset of this device. Cannot launch the simulation."
